mapper.select: SELECT eqm_cd, eqm_fg, eqm_nm, eqm_ist_dt, eqm_min_temp, eqm_max_temp, chck_perd, use_yn, eqm_mng, eqm_img FROM eqm ORDER BY eqm_cd

SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(eqm_cd, 4, 1) = '1' THEN SUBSTR(eqm_cd, 4) END) AS first_max, MAX(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(eqm_cd, 4, 1) = '2' THEN SUBSTR(eqm_cd, 4) END) AS second_max, MAX(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(eqm_cd, 4, 1) = '3' THEN SUBSTR(eqm_cd, 4) END) AS third_max, MAX(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(eqm_cd, 4, 1) = '4' THEN SUBSTR(eqm_cd, 4) END) AS fourth_max, MAX(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(eqm_cd, 4, 1) = '5' THEN SUBSTR(eqm_cd, 4) END) AS fifth_max FROM eqm WHERE SUBSTR(eqm_cd, 4, 1) IN ('1', '2', '3', '4', '5')
SELECT eqm_cd, eqm_fg, eqm_nm, eqm_ist_dt, eqm_min_temp, eqm_max_temp, chck_perd, use_yn, eqm_mng, eqm_img FROM eqm WHERE eqm_cd = #{eqmCd}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO eqm ( eqm_cd, eqm_fg, eqm_nm, eqm_ist_dt, eqm_min_temp, eqm_max_temp, chck_perd, use_yn, eqm_mng, eqm_img, eqm_img_path, prcs_cd ) values ( #{eqmCd}, #{eqmFg}, #{eqmNm},
#{eqmIstDt}
SYSDATE , #{eqmMinTemp}, #{eqmMaxTemp}, #{chckPerd}, #{useYn}, #{eqmMng}, #{eqmImg}, #{eqmImgPath},
'PRCS1000'
'PRCS2000'
'PRCS3000'
'PRCS4000'
'PRCS5000'
)
mapper.update: UPDATE eqm SET eqm_nm = #{eqmNm}, eqm_ist_dt = #{eqmIstDt}, eqm_min_temp = #{eqmMinTemp}, eqm_max_temp = #{eqmMaxTemp}, chck_perd = #{chckPerd}, use_yn = #{useYn}, eqm_mng = #{eqmMng}, eqm_img = #{eqmImg} WHERE eqm_cd = #{eqmCd}
mapper.select: SELECT c.CHECK_CD, c.EQM_CD, c.CHCK_FG, c.CHCK_DT, c.JDGMNT, c.DISPO_CTNT, c.CHCK_PSCH, c.EQM_NM, e.chck_perd+c.chck_dt next_chck_dt FROM eqm_check c join eqm e ON c.eqm_nm = e.eqm_nm ORDER BY chck_dt DESC
SELECT CHECK_CD, EQM_CD, CHCK_FG, CHCK_DT, JDGMNT, DISPO_CTNT, CHCK_PSCH, EQM_NM FROM eqm_check WHERE check_cd = #{checkCd}
mapper.insert:
SELECT 'CHK'||(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NVL(MAX(check_cd),'CHK999'),4)) + 1) check_cd FROM eqm_check
INSERT INTO eqm_check ( check_cd, eqm_cd, chck_fg, chck_dt, jdgmnt, dispo_ctnt, chck_psch, eqm_nm ) VALUES ( #{checkCd}, #{eqmCd}, #{chckFg}, #{chckDt}, #{jdgmnt}, #{dispoCtnt}, #{chckPsch}, #{eqmNm} )
mapper.update: UPDATE eqm_check SET chck_dt = #{chckDt}, jdgmnt = #{jdgmnt}, dispo_ctnt = #{dispoCtnt}, chck_psch = #{chckPsch}, chck_fg = #{chckFg} WHERE check_cd = #{checkCd}
mapper.select: SELECT nopr_cd, e.eqm_cd, e.eqm_nm, fr_dt, fr_hm, to_dt, to_hm, eqm_psch, opert_ctnt FROM eqm e JOIN eqm_opr ON e.eqm_cd = eqm_opr.eqm_cd
SELECT eqm_cd, eqm_nm, use_yn FROM eqm WHERE use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY eqm_cd
mapper.insert: BEGIN insert into eqm_opr (nopr_cd, eqm_cd, fr_dt, fr_hm, to_dt, to_hm, eqm_psch, opert_ctnt) values( #{noprCd}, #{eqmCd}, #{frDt}, #{frHm}, #{toDt}, #{toHm}, #{eqmPsch}, #{opertCtnt} ); UPDATE eqm SET use_yn = 'N' WHERE eqm_cd = #{eqmCd}; END;
mapper.update: UPDATE eqm_opr SET fr_dt = #{frDt}, fr_hm = #{frHm}, to_dt = #{toDt}, to_hm = #{toHm}, eqm_psch = #{eqmPsch}, opert_ctnt = #{opertCtnt} WHERE nopr_cd = #{noprCd}
